mapper.select: SELECT * FROM videoBoard order by boardID desc
mapper.insert: insert into videoBoard(accountId, categoryId, subject, object, youtubeLink, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{accountId}, #{categoryId}, #{subject}, #{object}, #{youtubeLink}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update videoBoard set subject = #{subject}, object = #{object}, youtubeLink = #{youtubeLink} where boardId = #{boardId}
